entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RequestReJIT crashes when called from CEEInfo::reportInliningDecision #95653
  • JIT: Validate DFS tree in post-phase checks #95652
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Should the loop bit vector traits be stored as part of `FlowGraphNaturalLoop`? #95651
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Consider compressing loop bit vectors further #95649
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Running `Scenario=WasmTestOnNodeJS` does not set `ENVIRONMENT_IS_NODE` #95639
  • Implement .NET Swift interop support targeting OSX and Apple mobile #95638
    9.0.0
  • End-user scenarios for .NET Swift interop #95636
    9.0.0
  • Binding Tools for Swift integration and distribution #95633
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.PhysicalFilesWatcher.RaiseChangeEvents throws uncatchable IOException on thread pool thread #95631
  • Icorrect comment for the year pattern in DateTimeFormat #95629
    Future
  • [browser] Validate that browser template debugging works #95627
    9.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Metadata Dependency question #95626
  • Issue with Delegate Pointers in .NET Core AOT using EasyHook #95624
  • [Perf] Regressions from cross-block local assertion prop #95645
  • [Perf] Regressions from "Remove BBJ_NONE" #95646
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization on Node, Windows throws with "non-standard" format of era #95623
  • .NET 8.0 ChannelClosedException using gRPC (Http2Connection) #95621
    9.0.0
  • Path functions behaving differently on UNC device paths than implied from documentation #95619
  • Flags enum ToString breaking change in .NET 8? #95617
  • Host error_codes.h should include basic description as comments #95615
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] DWARF debug info is generated for trimmed static fields #93868
  • `BigInteger` cast to `UInt128` throws `OverflowException` even when range is sufficient #95628
  • Get \u202F(8239) instead of ' '(32) on DateTime.ToLongTimeString when the currentCulture is en-us with in mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:8.0 #95620
  • Blazor WebAssembly unrecoverable when session cookie has large number of claims #40835
    Future
  • Stack overflow in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Metadata.ReflectionEmitMemberAccessor.CreateDelegate #57233
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests with libraries pgo and random osr stress #95600
    9.0.0
  • Split on Span and Count disfunctioning (bug) when multiple separators given #95625
  • System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Save(Stream stream) can not suppport .NET8 #95448
  • Do not run `stackLevelSetter` except for x86. #42673
    Future
  • JIT: clean up unused throw helpers #93948
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Alpine test #95663
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Bump WasmBuildTests timeout to 180min #95662
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.x
  • Fix call to RequestReJIT #95659
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: fix ANSI colors over redirected standard output. #95654
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Fix DateTimeFormat comments for year pattern (#95629) #95650
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Update terminology in loop cloning, and simplify a bit #95648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reverse parsed mail adresses in a single action #95647
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Reduce use of madvise DODUMP/DONTDUMP #95643
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [ios] Add optimized property to the Native AOT sample app #95640
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, os-ios, 8.0.2
  • JIT: Added `SVE_GD_2A` ARM64 encoding #95618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [mono][interp] Optimize ves_pinvoke_method () on wasm. #95545
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Switch `HammerServiceTest`, `BundleRename`, and `BundleLocalizedApp` to pre-built test assets. #95622
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Bump WasmBuildTests timeout to 180min #95630
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix generating debug info for static fields #95570
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not consider InUse registers for assigning to consecutive candidates #95612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [XUnitLogChecker] Fix condition that sets env variables for libraries runner scripts #95533
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] [PERF] Update Perf Android jobs to use the Windows 11 Pixel Queue. #95655
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] [PERF] Update Perf Android jobs to use the Windows 11 Pixel Queue. #95657
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-staging] [PERF] Update Perf Android jobs to use the Windows 11 Pixel Queue. #95656
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Complete thread abort support for the new EH #95616
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Update Perf Android jobs to use the Windows 11 Pixel Queue. #95614
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][AOT] Space in path to published project on unix #94306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Port loop cloning to the new loop representation #95326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix casing for "memoryRandomization" experiment so it matches the condition. #95644
    needs-area-label
  • Limit optSwitchConvert to TYP_INT/TYP_LONG #95608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix missing symbols for mono-aot-cross #95505
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 8.0.x
  • Fix whitespace issues to comply with code style #95602
    area-Meta
  • Fix mono-aot-cross .pdb file name #95604
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: removed unneeded throw helper blocks #95379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [JIT] Add BasicBlock::bbFlags helper methods #95139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move most of the remaining Strong Name code to internal to the C++ file and remove duplicate validation #95536
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Port VN and loop hoisting to new loop representation #95589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Make sure LOHThreshold less than region_size #95485
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Make isRemovableJmpCandidate less restrictive on AMD64 #95493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95216
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.2
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95217
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 7.0.16
  • Improve the hashtable for EEClassHash #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][System.Reflection.Emit] Fix explicitly setting the return type on a dynamic method #95271
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-reflection-mono, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][jit] Fix the bblock check in the box+callvirt optimization. #95500
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95302
    Servicing-consider, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Catch exception when subscribing to NetworkChange #95123
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.2
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95218
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.27
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm] Suppress export name minification #95613
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Consuming the return type instead of an interface #95601
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Updating Sum() implementation. #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] ILLink: Allow interface methods to not have newslot #95571
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • SslStream encryption buffer allocation improvements #95595
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Use a more performant way to get the current thread id #95609
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debug URL in lauchSettings.json in wasmbrowser template #95418
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement GetSortKey on hybrid mode #95260
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Introduce CallConvSwift and special register types to represent the Swift ABI calling convention #95065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Use multi-reg load/store for EncodeToUtf8 #95513
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Fix JitDisasm in release build #95502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some outdated helpers in libraries/Common #95515
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Change several more arrays to be assembly data spans (w/ collection expressions) #93535
    area-System.Runtime
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Consolidate wasi/wasm build bits #95535
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
